name: Deflectron
description:
Built from scratch ('pure' Unity) for our entry for One Game a Month #19. 

The theme for this month was 'backfire'. We took a literal approach.

Bounce the projectiles back, and don't hit the walls!

Controls: Mouse / WASD (gamepad support included)

You can check out the source code/assets for this project here.

---

Programming & Design by Tristan Edwards & Morrison Cole. Music by Morrison Cole (@morrisoncole).
